content: Is there a best-practices/recommend content description of FHIR IGs ? I'm able to find a HL7v3 version at https://wiki.hl7.org/Implementation_Guide , and a CDA version at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SD/CDA+Implementation+Guide+%28IG%29+Quality+Criteria - but nothing on FHIR IGs ...
Not yet, it's still a young industry

is that what this is supposed to be? https://build.fhir.org/ig/FHIR/ig-guidance/branches/master/index.html
is that being kept current? (no updates since august so I assume not)
This page: https://build.fhir.org/ig/FHIR/ig-guidance/branches/master/best-practice.html has light guidance but it's not comprehensive
Hmm - I like it, certainly a worthy checklist.
The guidance IG is more about "how certain features can be implemented in an IG". We need to get back to udate this..
the "best practice" part is, welll, some things not to forget when you make your own IG
and I guess a lot of it will depend on the organization. For example in Belgium we have a target model as guidance for artifacts, http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7-be/hl7-be-wow/metamodel.html
and we need to find some standard content bits - e.g. what goes in the Functional parts vs Technical parts...
The intention is that the guidance IG will be updated and will evolve and perhaps eventually get balloted as informative. Pull requests welcome.
